grammar terminalNounPhrase(allBut) :   Production

grammar.t[365]

(‘all’ | ‘everything’) (‘but’ | ‘except’ | ‘except’ ‘for’)
exceptList->except_

grammar terminalNounPhrase(anyBut) :   Production

grammar.t[379]

‘any’ nounPhrase->np_
(‘but’ | ‘except’ | ‘except’ ‘for’ | ‘but’ ‘not’) exceptList->except_
